Goodbye_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>You know, I've heard that some Yiga Clan
types have been spotted near here.

I hate to think that assassins who are
after Princess Zelda might be nearby!<sp:5:1:0>
Heavens forbid!
Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, to think that the Yiga Clan was right
under our noses...<sp:5:1:0> How awful!

Supposedly they're skilled with
disguises. So does that mean you
can't trust anyone?
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>And can they disguise themselves as objects and
such?<sp:5:1:0> Nah, not possible.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
